name: The Denpa Men 2: Beyond The Waves
name_original: The Denpa Men 2: Beyond The Waves
description:
The Denpa Men 2: Beyond The Waves is a RPG game developed by Genius Sonority. It was originally released in 2012. Genius Sonority published the game.
The Denpa Men 2: Beyond The Waves is available on Nintendo 3DS.
